name: dolphin-memory-reader
description: Node module that can read memory from the Dolphin Emulator

scripts.build: npm run compile:ts && cargo build --message-format=json-render-diagnostics --out-dir . -Z unstable-options
scripts.build-release: npm run build -- --release && mv -i dolphin_memory_reader.dll dist/index.node
scripts.build-local: npm run build && mv -i -f dolphin_memory_reader.dll src/node/index.node
scripts.install:git: rustup default nightly && npm run build-release
scripts.install:local: rustup default nightly && npm run build-local

author: sindrevatnaland97@gmail.com
